name: Road Trip Rollers
description:
For the GMTK Game Jam 2022! https://itch.io/jam/gmtk-jam-2022

CONTROLS

Browser: Mouse to move, double click or right-click to jump

Mobile: Touch to move, double tap to jump.

STORY

You're on a road trip with your kids to bring them fishing. While they wait, they play board games in the back. They don't know that the board game is cursed causing hazards on the road! Keep your eyes peeled and stay safe!

CREDITS

Programming by Me

Art by Keith Garces : https://twitter.com/Keith_Garces

 Music by Waterflame: https://www.newgrounds.com/audio/listen/492084
